title: Land for Sale in Ganemulla
details:
8.2 Perches of a very valuable Land for Sale in Kirindiwita Road, Ganemulla. The land is located 5 mints away from Ganemulla town. Easy access to Kadawatha, Kandana, Ja Ela & Ragama city and less than 45 mints drive to Colombo Capital by train or private vehicle.

• 1Km to Ganemulla Railway Station and Ganemulla Town.
• 15 Mints to Gampaha town.
• 20 minutes drive to Kadawatha Highway Entrance.
• Perfect residential area.
• Clear deeds.
• No Brokers.

Don’t miss this valuable investment opportunity in rapidly developing area in Gampaha District.

Negotiable.
